title: Indian startups filed over 400 tech patents from 2015 to 2021, healthcare remains focus area - The New Indian Express
content:
1. Indian startups filed over 400 tech patents from 2015 to 2021, healthcare remains focus area  The New Indian Express

description: According to Nasscom, Indian companies have filed 1,38,000 tech patents in India and over 9,500 patents in the US during 2015-2021
